articles.title: ISRO record: Chinese state media says Beijing can learn lessons from India - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A grudgingly complimentary state media piece on Monday said the Communist country could learn a “number of lessons” from its neighbour’s low-price and efficiency-driven advantages in space commerce.
articles.content:
Is India beating China in its own game building a low-price, efficient and increasingly reliable model in the space sector?

articles.author: Jui Dharwadkar
articles.title: Indian scientists discover ‘Saraswati’, a supercluster of galaxies - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The scientists from Pune stated that previously only a few comparatively large superclusters have been reported, for example the Shapley Concentration or the Sloan Great Wall in the nearby universe, while the Saraswati supercluster is far more distant one.
articles.content: Indian scientists have discovered Saraswati, a large supercluster of galaxies located in the direction of the constellation Pisces, and at a distance of 4,000 million (400 crore) light years away fro… [+2844 chars]
